_header: Jesu that was fulfilled of grace
_description: Gospel for Thursday in Holy Week, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Ihesu crist þat was fulfild of graceffast bifor þe feste of pasche…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …God grante vs grace his will to doAnd kepe his laus and cum him to
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Ante diem festum pasche & cetera”; ends “Amen.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: fferia v proxima secundum Iohannem (rubric, f. 66va)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.164-168.
